name: yyc3-smart-file-manager
description: YYC³智能文件管理系统 - 智能同步、自动备份、智能清理

scripts.scan: node -e "const Manager = require('./SmartFileManager'); const m = new Manager(); m.scanExistingFiles().then(() => console.log('扫描完成'))"
scripts.sync: node -e "const Manager = require('./SmartFileManager'); const m = new Manager(); m.smartSync()"
scripts.cleanup: node -e "const Manager = require('./SmartFileManager'); const m = new Manager(); m.smartCleanup()"
scripts.backup: node -e "const Manager = require('./SmartFileManager'); const m = new Manager(); m.fullBackup()"
scripts.report: node -e "const Manager = require('./SmartFileManager'); const m = new Manager(); m.generateReport().then(r => console.log(JSON.stringify(r, null, 2)))"

author: YYC3 AI Family
